results.title: Compare AWS and Azure compute services - Azure Architecture Center
results.description: Compare the compute services in Azure and AWS. Explore the differences in virtual machines, containers, and serverless technologies.

descriptions.content: Compare the compute services in Azure and AWS.

results.title: Azure for AWS Professionals - Azure Architecture Center
results.description: Learn about the basics of the Microsoft Azure platform, accounts, and services. Discover key similarities and differences between the AWS and Azure platforms.

results.title: Connect your AWS account - Microsoft Defender for Cloud
results.description: Defend your AWS resources with Microsoft Defender for Cloud, a guide to set up and configure Defender for Cloud to protect your workloads in AWS.

descriptions.content: Defend your AWS resources with Microsoft Defender for Cloud, a guide to set up and configure Defender for Cloud to protect your workloads in AWS.
